p:
HA/M1 VLPs were purified by sucrose density gradient centrifugation as described previously
14, 15 . Western blot was performed to analyze the expression of HA and M1 proteins in the prepared VLPs using their specific antibodies. Characteristic bands with molecular weights of 55–70 KD (Fig. 1A) and ∼25 KD (Fig. 1B) were observed for HA and M1 proteins, respectively, which were consistent with the molecular weights estimated from their amino acid compositions. TEM data showed that the prepared VLPs were spherical in morphology with a diameter of ∼100 nm (Fig. 1C), which was similar with previous studies
16, 17 . These results suggest that influenza HA VLPs were successfully produced for immunizations.
